insults: If your gonna be two faced, honey at least make one of them pretty.

quotes: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. Buddha
Look at the sparrows; they do not know what they will do in the next moment. Let us literally live from moment to moment. Mahatma Gandhi
dadjokes: Why didn't the vampire attack Taylor Swift? She had bad blood.
